title: Alarms
fullText:
For the protection of the battery bank, it is desirable to have an indication of high or low battery voltage. In stand-alone power systems these may take the form of the system voltmeter in combination with high and low volt alarms in any inverter or system controller, or a low volt d.c. cut-off incorporated in the PV regulator.
In any case, where a low battery voltage load disconnect is not available, a dedicated cut- off unit should be fitted.
